I had no idea until I watched that. They were so easy though. I washed my hair and let it get almost dry then used these. I have long hair and was afraid doing the end parts would leave the upper part of my hair frizzy but it didn't. They worked great. Next time I will leave them on overnight too. I have soft and bouncy hair and these made my very curly underneath part lay much better. No more. using heat on my hair.
It would have got 5 stars had it come with just a picture showing how to use these. Also I am wondering how to get the wand back apart to store it.
I very highly recommend this product. Review Title: So neat Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

- **Review Behavior:** The user has a history of providing detailed feedback in reviews, expressing both positive and negative experiences. Their recent review highlights satisfaction with a styling tool, indicating a balanced approach to assessing a wider range of hair products. 

- **Overall Disposition:** The user values product effectiveness and is likely to voice disappointments when expectations are not met, but they also demonstrate appreciation when products or tools deliver satisfactory results.
